value.name: Man shot in Rifle bridge incident has died; police seeking witness information
value.description: Allan George, 57, was shot on the Colorado River Bridge on Highway 13 heading into Rifle, and taken to Grand River Hospital, where he was pronounced dead. George was stopped by Rifle Police shortly after 7 p.m. Monday, Aug. 5, on an active warrant as a sex ...

value.name: Gavin MacLeod, ‘Love Boat’ captain, dies at 90
